item.title: Get prepped for Six Sigma Green and Yellow Belt certification for $39.99
item.description: Save 49% on the Lean Six Sigma Green and Yellow Belt training bundle. Enroll in this online course while it's on sale for $39.99 (reg. $78.99).

item.title: Two devices in one: This Lenovo Chromebook-tablet combo is just $111 right now
